entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near noon with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High 8. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
